modName: CHSBHC v3  ADM  - Temptress of Flame
summary:
I re-made this lady into CHSBHC v3 and ADM  Loshirai14\'s  temptress of flame v3. 

Hopefully we\'ll be all good.  Sorry for the long \'ol delay.  :[
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img834/1296/banner2new.png[/IMG]

1) Endorse the original, because  Loshirai14  said so :D   =  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27432

2) Unfortunately, because of how the esp works out, it\'s self contained.  Sorry. 

3) 1st person should be good to go.  Removed the bouncy from it, but the gauntlets have funny invisible bands at the wrists  :(

4) Lots of clipping.  But also WEIGHT SLIDER !!!!  *squee!!!*  XD

5) Also, CHSBv3 and ADM.  WOOT  :>

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img6/5552/install2.png[/IMG]

1) I\'m dead serious, endorse the original.  I effed up Loshirai\'s esp and meshes.
2) Also, self contained.
3) I\'m in for a \"long nap\" if I have any more endorsements.  REALLY, endorse Loshirai.  >:|

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/9498/misc2.png[/IMG]

---tell me what to fix!  I\'m relearning!  MOAR CHSB and ADM!!!

[u]Options on tap[/u]:
- ring of armor: temptress of Flame (whole armor set in ring form)
- seperate enchantable pieces : flame [bra, leggings, thong, gauntlets], horns
- further divided into CHSBv3 and ADM.

-  both are craftable and upgradable at the forge and armor table (under jewelry)
- \"help ADM 0\"  \"help CHSB 0\"  \"help Temptress 0\"  in the console  
-  the ring armor (Temptress of Flames) with [u]NH[/u] means hornless;  NO HORNS  :0

[IMG=center]http://imageshack.us/a/img841/61/endbanner2.png[/IMG]
author: Loshirai14  ozzking
